title: CNBC Daily Open: Muted U.S. CPI and cooling tensions with Iran give investors some comfort
summary_full: The U.S. consumer price index on Friday stateside provided some balm to investors, who have been singed by drops in the market because of AI-related fears
summary_public: The U.S. consumer price index on Friday stateside provided some balm to investors, who have been singed by drops in the market because of AI-related fears

IR.label: neutral
IR.evidence: cooling tensions with Iran give investors some comfort
